title: Name variables
text: Let n $$=$$ the amount of stoves sold and m $$=$$ the salary.

title: Equations
text: We know the company A pays $12000 + $150 for every cable package sold, and the second company pays $24000 + $50 for each package sold. Using this, we can create two equations. One is $$m=12000+150n$$, and the other $$m=24000+50n$$.

title: Solve
text: Now, solve for n or m, and plug it into the equation to find the other variable.
